Body:
kwargs = {}
if id_type is not None:
    kwargs[id_type] = ids
df = df_creation_func(pickle_file, **kwargs)
assert isinstance(df, pd.DataFrame)
pytest.mark.parametrize('pickle_file, df_creation_func, id_type, ids', [(
    CYCLES_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_cycles_df, 'device_ids', [SENSOR_ID1]), (
    CYCLES_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_cycles_df, None, None), (
    SENSOR_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_sensors_df, 'sensor_ids', [SENSOR_ID1]),
    (SENSOR_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_sensors_df, None, None), (
    GEOSPATIAL_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_geospatial_df, 'location_ids', [
    LOCATION_ID1]), (GEOSPATIAL_PICKLE_FILE, hi.create_geospatial_df, None,
    None)])
